name: Picross Love
summary: Picross, also known as hanjie or nonogram, is a puzzle loved around the world that consists of filling the right boxes that together form a hidden drawing. Additionally in "Picross Love", you will be accompanied by lovely women. It may not improve your concentration, but it will surely make your time more enjoyable. Do you think it's difficult? No worries! Our teacher, Pico-chan, will teach you, step by step, how to become a Picross champion!
